title: Steamed Clams with Fennel and Spicy Italian Sausage
directions: Melt butter in heavy large skillet over medium heat. Add onion, chopped fennel, and fennel seeds; saut√© until vegetables begin to soften, about 5 minutes. Add sausage and cook until browned, breaking up lumps with back of spoon and stirring frequently, about 5 minutes. Stir in oregano, tomatoes with juice, and wine; increase heat and bring to boil. Add clams, cover skillet, and cook until clams open (discard any clams that do not open), about 5 minutes. Divide among bowls; sprinkle parsley over and serve.
ingredients: 1/2 pound spicy Italian sausages, casings removed
2 pounds Manila clams or littleneck clams, scrubbed
